titles.title: To designate the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 153 East 110th Street in New York, New York, as the ``Tito Puente Post Office Building''.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Government Reform.

bill.summary: 3/20/2001--Introduced. Designates the U.S. Postal Service facility located at 153 East 110th Street in New York, New York, as the Tito Puente Post Office Building.
